name: Skull Fang
overview:
Skull Fang was produced by Data East Japan in 1996.

An air combat shooter that has a chase theme.

Waste the Competition!

Data East's SKULL FANG blows other shooters out of the sky with an arsenal of great features:
*4 Different Planes - Each with different levels of attack, defense, speed & maneuverability!
*2 Unique Play Modes - Choose from Auto-Scroll Mode or advanced, variable throttle Chase Mode!
8 Power-Ups - Increase your Fighter or Bomber weapons, power and maneuverability!
*Hidden Flight Techniques - Attack from above, use air brakes, side thrust and High Ion Shields!
